org.opendaylight.controller.remote.rpc

Class RpcManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.common.actor.AbstractUntypedActor
        • org.opendaylight.controller.remote.rpc.RpcManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class RpcManager
extends AbstractUntypedActor
    This class acts as a supervisor, creates all the actors, resumes them, if an exception is thrown. It also starts the rpc listeners
